description - Variable in class webapp.model.User
 
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.LoginServlet
should support the api /login or /session for login - we sent the password in header and not in params for safety issues
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.QuestionsServlet
should support : /questions - search for all questions /question/ - search for specific question /question//answers - search all answers of specific question
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.TopicsServlet
Should support /topics?currentPage - search for 20 topics according to currentPage
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.UsersServlet
should support /users - get all users according to logic conditions
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.AnswersServlet
Should support /answers - request from client to insert new answer
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.LoginServlet
should support the api /logout
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.QuestionsServlet
Should support /questions - for insert new question to DB.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.UsersServlet
should support the api /users - register to our system
doPut(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.AnswersServlet
Should support update of votes by /answers?answerVote
doPut(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class servlets.QuestionsServlet
Should support /questions/?questionVotes - update questionVotes of specific question
